Controls

  • WASD Move
  • Down+Jump Fall through platform
  • Space Jump
  • Shift Sprint
  • Esc Pause / Menu

About

This is the web build of Super Tux War (Godot 4.5). The wrapper keeps a crisp 16:9 game area and leaves room for notes and links.

Source: github.com/tuxx/super-tux-war
